div.p:
Howdy! Petrolia C.I.S.D. is a
2A school in Clay County, Texas. Petrol
is located approximately 30 minutes
NE of Wichita Falls. Petrolia CISD is comprised of
4 communites of Byers, Charlie, Dean and Petrolia.
